title: Do I have anything to lose if I chose to do the SAT essay on the new SAT? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A! No, you don’t really have anything to lose. Since the writing is optional, it’s not part of your total score. Most colleges don’t pay any attention to the writing, and those that do require or recommend it often don’t pay much attention to it either. Basically, unless you think you’ll do spectacularly, your writing score will have little effect on admissions one way or another.
